+	}

+package net.runelite.client.plugins.menuentryswapper;
+
+import lombok.Getter;
+import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
+
+@Getter
+@RequiredArgsConstructor
+public enum SellMode
+{
+	OFF("Off"),
+	SELL_1("Sell 1"),
+	SELL_5("Sell 5"),
+	SELL_10("Sell 10"),
+	SELL_50("Sell 50");
+
+	private final String name;
+
+	@Override
+	public String toString()
+	{
+		return name;
+	}

nodes.bodyText: Added this for other similar menu entry swaps as well.

I changed this so that I could have the option strings in BuyMode and Sellmode have the same capitalization as they do in-game, rather than already being in lower case. Should I change BuyMode and Sellmode to just have the option be lowercase to start with?
